thread.section_title: Rentalcars.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Rentalcars.com | www.rentalcars.com
thread.title: Stephen Johnston

author: Stephen Johnston
title: Stephen Johnston
text:
America Rental in Cancun changed their policy regarding insurance and require an actual letter from Credit Card Company with name and credit card number and what insurance the credit card covers. Without it they want to charge for both the CDW, LP, and increased liability $30+ day!
Waived the CDW and Loss Prevention and they wouldn't accept without a letter from my bank - they rented to me last year with the standard insurance certificate. What a frustrating experience!
